entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending near noon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
